extendedInfo.description: A long time ago in galaxy far, far away there was very pretty princess who lived in big, big magic crane tower.She was there alone and nobody cared to visit her.Every day she was looking from the top of her tower for handsome prince, who will save her and provide entertainment.Will you be her Prince Charming?Great addicting puzzle game now for Android!Made by Evil Indie Games for Ludum Dare 22 (72 hours game jam)!Info: http://www.ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-22/?action=preview&uid=8069

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Please add a limited Amount of undo actions. Currently the way it is setup is just complicated because you get to a certain point and you make a simple mistake and you have to restart all the way. Besides i think the controls could be simplified with joystick option.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing concept and visuals!
reviews.comment: This is the most spectacular puzzle game I ve ever played. Love the music and the rest!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its ok...
reviews.comment: But it needs more in it, it can get boring and the voices freak me out so if u change I will change to 5 stars.(good if you like  simple puzzle games)
reviews.author: Charlotte Coleby
